title: Message saying "reported for bad language"
body: I barely talk in my game other than in champ select and post game to say gg and what position i want

replies.body: I believe you get a notification just for being reported, regardless of whether the report is valid or not. Even assuming it is valid, take it as a warning and move it. One report alone will not instigate any form of punishment.
^This guy. If you're positive you haven't been offensive then just ignore the report.
because everyone who has ever been reported should never have actually gotten reported, it was a mistake, it was reporting abuse, the person reporting is the toxic/salty %%%%....
